name: 林律吟
objective: In this class, practical engineering mathematics including vector, vector integral, series solution, Fourier Series Matrices, Determinants and Eigenvalues will be introduced.
schedule:
Week 1 No class
Week 2 Chapter 6 Vector and Vector Spaces
Week 3 Chapter 6 Vector and Vector Spaces
Week 4 Chapter 12 Vector Integral Calculus  
Week 5 Chapter 12 Vector Integral Calculus 
Week 6 First mid-term
Week 7 Chapter 4 Series Solutions
Week 8 Chapter 4 Series Solutions
Week 9 Chapter 13 Fourier Series 
Week 10 Chapter 13 Fourier Series
Week 11 Chapter 13 Fourier Series
Week 12 Second mid-term
Week 13 Chapter 7 Matrices and Linear Systems 
Week 14 Chapter 8 Determinants 
Week 15 Chapter 9 Eigenvalues, Diagonalization, and Special Matrices  
Week 16 Chapter 9 Eigenvalues, Diagonalization, and Special Matrices
Week 17 Final term
scorePolicy:
1. Present/absent 10%
2. Quiz 10% each  30% total
3. Mid-term, final term 20% each 60% total
materials:
Advanced Engineering Mathematics (7th edition)
Peter V. O'Neil
